summary:
The request does not pertain to any violent incidents or notable news related to violence, but rather focuses on job postings and economic developments within Uganda and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). No significant incidents involving violence, their locations, or estimated casualties are mentioned in the provided text. It primarily discusses employment opportunities with various organizations and touches on the situation of Congolese rebels in Uganda alongside economic transactions involving the Republic of the Congo.
